comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3

Browser NOT LOAD ---%20--- into tag embed ;
example;
<embed src="video/file%20ref/asturias.wmv">

file:///C:/webcont/video/med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909)/asturias.wmv
---- med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909) -----

<embed src="file:///C:/webcont/video/med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909)/asturias.wmv" width="400" height="300"></embed> NOT LOAD IN BROWSER;


<embed src="file:///C:/webcont/video/med Asturias (Leyenda) - Isaac Albeniz (1860-1909)/asturias.wmv" width="400" height="300"></embed> YES LOAD IN BROWSER;



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. ---  Previous directory address href =  /med Asturias (Leyenda) Isaac Albeniz (1860-1909)/ ---
2.----- embe src = they will count %20 into previous directory ----
3. embed not load
4.


Expected Results:  

 emb.src = unescape(src);
comments.author: lucianolllg@gmail.com
comments.creator: lucianolllg@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3

Browser NOT LOAD ---%20--- into tag embed ;
example;
<embed src="video/file%20ref/asturias.wmv">

file:///C:/webcont/video/med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909)/asturias.wmv
---- med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909) -----

<embed src="file:///C:/webcont/video/med%20Asturias%20(Leyenda)%20-%20Isaac%20Albeniz%20(1860-1909)/asturias.wmv" width="400" height="300"></embed> NOT LOAD IN BROWSER;


<embed src="file:///C:/webcont/video/med Asturias (Leyenda) - Isaac Albeniz (1860-1909)/asturias.wmv" width="400" height="300"></embed> YES LOAD IN BROWSER;



Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. ---  Previous directory address href =  /med Asturias (Leyenda) Isaac Albeniz (1860-1909)/ ---
2.----- embe src = they will count %20 into previous directory ----
3. embed not load
4.


Expected Results:  

 emb.src = unescape(src);

Is this only a problem for file: URLs, or does the same happen with http: URLs?

Is this only a problem for <embed src>, or is it also a problem for <a href>?

Is this only a problem for wmv, or are other plugins affected?  (If it's wmv-only, it might be related to bug 280600.)
comments.raw_text:
Is this only a problem for file: URLs, or does the same happen with http: URLs?

Is this only a problem for <embed src>, or is it also a problem for <a href>?

Is this only a problem for wmv, or are other plugins affected?  (If it's wmv-only, it might be related to bug 280600.)

comments.author: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.creator: tdowner@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This bug was reported on Firefox 2.x or older, which is no longer supported and will not be receiving any more updates. I strongly suggest that you update to Firefox 3.6.3 or later, update your plugins (flash, adobe, etc.), and retest in a new profile. If you still see the issue with the updated Firefox, please post here. Otherwise, please close as RESOLVED > WORKSFORME
http://www.mozilla.com
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Managing+profiles
http://support.mozilla.com/kb/Safe+mode
